head: New Paper
text: Eli's paper, Finding Waldo: Learning about Users from their Interactions, accepted to IEEE VAST and TVCG!

head: New Paper
text: Lane's paper, Ranking Visualizations of Correlation using Weber's Law, accepted to IEEE InfoVis and TVCG!

head: Special Event
text: Hiroshi Ishii speaks on Vision-Driven: Beyond Tangible Bits, Towards Radical Atoms at the VALT and HCI Labs.

head: Internship
text: Alvitta is heading to IBM Research in San Jose, CA this summer!

head: Internship
text: Eli is heading to Microsoft Research in Redmond, WA this summer!

head: New Grant
text: Remco receives a new grant from Tufts CTSI, Development of the Prognosis Assessment for Active and Conservative Treatment Tool.
